content: That is evidence that KD is currently a more well rounded and impactful player — although Steph’s gravitational pull once he passes half-court probably helps KD and everyone else in ways that cannot be fully reciprocated — but that doesn’t necessarily answer the question of whose team it is. There are certainly times that it seems as if it is Draymond’s team. Assuming these concepts have any real meaning at all, my suspicion is that the Warriors are an anomaly — the NBA’s first great oligarchy.
